correctness.rationale: Several schema violations and factual issues are present despite some correct elements (e.g., TALD at 200 °C, 20 nm thickness, supercycle counts 0:2:2/1:2:2/2:2:2, device metrics for Dev. A–C). Schema/completeness problems: (1) Required objects contain nulls: processParameters.pressure, nucleationPeriod, conformality.aspectRatio, roughness.value, filmDensity.value, and reactor are set to null or with missing quantityValue/unit, violating the schema. thicknessControl.growthPerCycle is set to null (should be a valid object or omitted). (2) Placeholders used instead of valid values: carrierGas, purgingGas, deliveryMethod, and safety are "Not Found"; required fields must be populated with real values or the field omitted if optional. (3) saturation is set to False, contradicting the article’s demonstration of ALD windows and linear/saturating behavior at 200 °C (should be True). (4) Subthreshold swing is misreported as 0.21 mV; the article states 0.21 V/dec. Use unit V (schema’s ElectricPotential) and correct value. (5) uniformity.variation = 10% is not film thickness uniformity; the 10% refers to device-to-device/run-to-run parameter variation, so this entry is not grounded. (6) filmComposition.elementalConcentration lists a single percentage (5/10/14%) without specifying the element and omits Ga, Zn, and O; provide per-element at.% consistent with Table 1 or restructure per schema. (7) coReactant is given once for "InGaZnO" instead of per subcycle compound (InOx, GaOx, ZnO); article indicates O3 for all subcycles—list it per compound. These items should be corrected to align with the article and comply with the schema.

completeness.rationale: Several schema-required fields are missing or populated with null/placeholder values, and some units are incorrect, despite many correct high-level details. Positives: three separate ALD IGZO processes (Comp. A/B/C) are captured; temperature (200 °C), substrate (SiO2/Si), oxidant (O3), supercycle ratios (0:2:2, 1:2:2, 2:2:2), film thickness (~20 nm), device structure (TGBC), and device metrics (μ_FE, V_TH, SS for ITO S/D) align with the article. Major issues: (1) Schema violations and nulls: processParameters.pressure has null quantityValue and quantityKind; thicknessControl.nucleationPeriod has nulls; growthPerCycle is set to null; reactor and plasmaPower are present as null objects; conformality.aspectRatio, roughness.value, and filmDensity.value contain nulls. Required properties must be present with valid numeric/unit values or omitted if optional. (2) Dosing, purge, and flow details are left as empty arrays; the schema requires these properties and the instruction prohibits empty values. (3) Carrier/purging gas are set to the literal string “Not Found,” which does not meet the no-empty/traceable requirement; the article provides no gases, so these are incomplete. (4) Subthreshold swing units are incorrect: values are in V/dec in the article (e.g., 0.20–0.21 V/dec), but the extraction encodes them as mV without converting numerically (e.g., 0.21 mV instead of 210 mV). (5) Optical properties (band gap from REELS: 3.51, 3.23, 3.10 eV) reported in the article are omitted though readily extractable; characterization method (REELS) should be recorded. (6) Film composition is only partially captured (single at.% value for In); the article provides full at.% for In, Ga, Zn, and O (Table 1), which should be represented for completeness/traceability (and atomic ratios are correctly included). (7) Supercycle sequence is given generically and does not reflect possible sequence differences noted in the text; at minimum, explicitly state the fixed sequence used for each composition as shown in Fig. 1c. (8) DeviceProperties for Mo S/D devices are absent; while the ALD process is identical, the article reports both sets and deviceProperties could be represented in additional process entries or otherwise noted. To improve: provide valid pressure (or omit if unknown and optional), fill dosing/purge/flow or clearly indicate not reported per compound, supply growth-per-cycle (from SI Fig. S1) and band gaps with REELS as method, correct SS units, add full elemental at.% values for each composition, and remove null objects (reactor, plasmaPower) if not reported.
